content: rounds on edge on your left needle and knit it both versions *k2tog yo* repeat * to together with the next stitch on the needle the end of the round and so on until all the stitches are consumed © elena nodel 2009 orbit skirt - 4 - references continue knitting in stockinette stitch for worsted version 4 rounds 1 provisional cast on dk version 5 rounds www youtube com/watch v=gswg6sj1z2i&fe both versions bind off ature=related i use the second technique shown in fold at the yarn overs and sew the bound off this video edge to the inside of the skirt i e a picot edge hem www youtube com/watch v=r3j-sux_whe finishing touches 2 directional increases weave in any loose ends www youtube com/watch v=cnrv0uf2clk&n thread the elastic through use safety pin to r=1 guide the elastic through the enclosed waistband overlap elastic ends by 1 5 acknowledgments cm/0 5 inches sew together heartfelt thanks and my deepest gratitude go to my wonderful group of testers whose hard work brought this pattern to you special thanks go to janet for helping me with the presentation of this pattern contact information email jenfaifel@gmail com pattern designs copyright www ravelry com/designers/elena-nodel please respect my designer rights and as such colour adventures yarns on etsy the copyright of this pattern will always remain with me i am providing this pattern www anadiomena etsy com for personal home use only you may make blog www anadiomenadesigns blogspot com garments from it as gifts or donate to charities and fundraisers commercial use of this ravelry username anadiomena pattern is a violation of the copyright selling ravelry group anadiomena s adventures products made from this pattern or distributing this pattern in any manner is facebook prohibited under the copyright unless i elena www facebook com/anadiomenasdesigns nodel have granted express written permission twitter www twitter com/anadiomenasdesi © elena nodel 2009
